MessageSecurityVersion Class

Definition

An abstract container class that, when implemented by several of its static properties, contains version information for security components.

In this Article

public abstract class MessageSecurityVersion
Inheritance
Object
MessageSecurityVersion

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Remarks

This class is the extensibility point for customizing token serialization.

This class is a singleton that provides information about the versions of the security specifications, (WS-Security, WS-Trust, WS-Secure Conversation and WS-Security Policy), that must be supported by a binding.

The class contains seven static properties, each of which returns an instance of this class. Each of these properties represents a different combination of security specification versions. The instances of this class are used as parameters in the Create…CertificateBindingElement method calls on the SecurityBindingElement class. If you pass the Default property, you create a standard version of the binding element. To create a non-standard version, pass the property that matches your version.

The class also contains abstract properties that are implemented by the previous instances.

Properties

BasicSecurityProfileVersion

Gets the version information for the Basic Security Profile.

public abstract System.ServiceModel.Security.BasicSecurityProfileVersion BasicSecurityProfileVersion { get; }
Value
BasicSecurityProfileVersion

The BasicSecurityProfileVersion object.

Remarks

This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions, and so returns a different value for this property.

Default

Gets the version information for default message security.

public static System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion Default { get; }
Value
MessageSecurityVersion

The MessageSecurityVersion object that represents the default message security.

Remarks

The default security specifications are WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1.

This static property returns an instance of this class. The instance of this class is used as parameters in the Create…CertificateBindingElement method calls on the SecurityBindingElement class.

SecureConversationVersion

Gets the WS-SecureConversation version that corresponds to the message security version.

public System.ServiceModel.Security.SecureConversationVersion SecureConversationVersion { get; }
Value
SecureConversationVersion

The SecureConversationVersion object that corresponds to the message security version.

Remarks

This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

SecurityPolicyVersion

Gets the WS-SecurityPolicy version that corresponds to the message security version.

public abstract System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityPolicyVersion SecurityPolicyVersion { get; }
Value
SecurityPolicyVersion

The SecurityPolicyVersion object that corresponds to the message security version.

Remarks

This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

SecurityTokenVersion

Gets the security token version that corresponds to the message security version.

public System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion SecurityTokenVersion { get; }
Value
SecurityTokenVersion

The SecurityTokenVersion object that corresponds to the message security version.

Remarks

This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

This property is used to query a token serializer factory interface defined in SecurityTokenVersion for a token serializer instance capable of serializing tokens.

SecurityVersion

Gets the WS-Security version that corresponds to the message security version.

public System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityVersion SecurityVersion { get; }
Value
SecurityVersion

The SecurityVersion object that corresponds to the message security version.

Remarks

This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

TrustVersion

Gets the WS-Trust version that corresponds to the message security version.

public System.ServiceModel.Security.TrustVersion TrustVersion { get; }
Value
TrustVersion

The TrustVersion object that corresponds to the message security version.

Remarks

This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.
